verses.verse: וַֽיְהִי֙ <WH1961> came בִּשְׁנַ֣ת <WH8141> year אַרְבַּ֔ע <WH702> And it came to pass in the fourth לְדָרְיָ֖וֶשׁ <WH1867> Darius הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <WH4428> of king הָיָ֨ה <WH1961> came דְבַר־ <WH1697> [that] the word יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to זְכַרְיָ֗ה <WH2148> came unto Zechariah בְּאַרְבָּעָ֛ה <WH702> in the fourth לַחֹ֥דֶשׁ <WH2320> month הַתְּשִׁעִ֖י <WH8671> [day] of the ninth בְּכִסְלֵֽו׃ <WH3691> [even] in Chisleu

וַיִּשְׁלַח֙ <WH7971> When they had sent בֵּֽית־ אֵ֔ל <WH1008> Bethel שַׂר־ אֶ֕צֶר <WH8272> Sherezer וְרֶ֥גֶם מֶ֖לֶךְ <WH7278> and Regemmelech וַֽאֲנָשָׁ֑יו <WH582> and their men לְחַלּ֖וֹת <WH2470> to pray אֶת־ <WH853> פְּנֵ֥י <WH6440> before יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3069> God

לֵאמֹ֗ר <WH559> [And] to speak אֶל־ <WH413> to הַכֹּֽהֲנִים֙ <WH3548> unto the priests אֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> who לְבֵית־ <WH1004> which [were] in the house יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> of the LORD צְבָא֔וֹת <WH6635> of hosts וְאֶל־ <WH413> and to הַנְּבִיאִ֖ים <WH5030> and to the prophets לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying הַֽאֶבְכֶּה֙ <WH1058> Should I weep בַּחֹ֣דֶשׁ <WH2320> month הַחֲמִשִׁ֔י <WH2549> in the fifth הִנָּזֵ֕ר <WH5144> separating כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who עָשִׂ֔יתִי <WH6213> myself as I have done זֶ֖ה <WH2088> these כַּמֶּ֥ה <WH4100> many שָׁנִֽים׃ <WH8141> whole age פ
וַיְהִ֛י <WH1961> came דְּבַר־ <WH1697> Then came the word יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> of the LORD צְבָא֖וֹת <WH6635> of hosts אֵלַ֥י <WH413> to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> unto me saying

אֱמֹר֙ <WH559> Speak אֶל־ <WH413> to כָּל־ <WH3605> all עַ֣ם <WH5971> unto all the people הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> of the land וְאֶל־ <WH413> and to הַכֹּהֲנִ֖ים <WH3548> and to the priests לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying כִּֽי־ <WH3588> When צַמְתֶּ֨ם <WH6684> When ye fasted וְסָפ֜וֹד <WH5594> and mourned בַּחֲמִישִׁ֣י <WH2549> in the fifth וּבַשְּׁבִיעִ֗י <WH7637> and seventh וְזֶה֙ <WH2088> these שִׁבְעִ֣ים <WH7657> [month] even those seventy שָׁנָ֔ה <WH8141> years הֲצ֥וֹם <WH6684> did ye at all צַמְתֻּ֖נִי <WH6684> fast אָֽנִי׃ <WH589> I

וְכִ֥י <WH3588> When תֹאכְל֖וּ <WH398> And when ye did eat וְכִ֣י <WH3588> When תִשְׁתּ֑וּ <WH8354> and when ye did drink הֲל֤וֹא <WH3808> not אַתֶּם֙ <WH859> you הָאֹ֣כְלִ֔ים <WH398> did not ye eat וְאַתֶּ֖ם <WH859> you הַשֹּׁתִֽים׃ <WH8354> [for yourselves] and drink

הֲל֣וֹא <WH3808> not אֶת־ <WH853> הַדְּבָרִ֗ים <WH1697> [Should ye] not [hear] the words אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which קָרָ֤א <WH7121> hath cried יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> which the LORD בְּיַד֙ <WH3027> by הַנְּבִיאִ֣ים <WH5030> prophets הָרִֽאשֹׁנִ֔ים <WH7223> the former בִּהְי֤וֹת <WH1961> become יְרוּשָׁלִַ֙ם֙ <WH3389> when Jerusalem יֹשֶׁ֣בֶת <WH3427> was inhabited וּשְׁלֵוָ֔ה <WH7961> and in prosperity וְעָרֶ֖יהָ <WH5892> and the cities סְבִיבֹתֶ֑יהָ <WH5439> thereof round about her וְהַנֶּ֥גֶב <WH5045> the south וְהַשְּׁפֵלָ֖ה <WH8219> and the foothills יֹשֵֽׁב׃ <WH3427> when [men] inhabited פ
וַֽיְהִי֙ <WH1961> came דְּבַר־ <WH1697> And the word יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to זְכַרְיָ֖ה <WH2148> came unto Zechariah לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

כֹּ֥ה <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֛ר <WH559> Thus speaketh יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> the LORD צְבָא֖וֹת <WH6635> of hosts לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying מִשְׁפַּ֤ט <WH4941> judgment אֱמֶת֙ <WH571> true. שְׁפֹ֔טוּ <WH8199> Execute וְחֶ֣סֶד <WH2617> mercy וְרַֽחֲמִ֔ים <WH7356> and compassions עֲשׂ֖וּ <WH6213> and shew אִ֥ישׁ <WH376> every man אֶת־ <WH854> for אָחִֽיו׃ <WH251> to his brother

וְאַלְמָנָ֧ה <WH490> not the widow וְיָת֛וֹם <WH3490> nor the fatherless גֵּ֥ר <WH1616> the stranger וְעָנִ֖י <WH6041> nor the poor אַֽל־ <WH408> not תַּעֲשֹׁ֑קוּ <WH6231> And oppress וְרָעַת֙ <WH7451> evil אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> against אָחִ֔יו <WH251> his brother אַֽל־ <WH408> not תַּחְשְׁב֖וּ <WH2803> and let none of you imagine בִּלְבַבְכֶֽם׃ <WH3824> in your heart

וַיְמָאֲנ֣וּ <WH3985> But they refused לְהַקְשִׁ֔יב <WH7181> to hearken וַיִּתְּנ֥וּ <WH5414> and turned כָתֵ֖ף <WH3802> the shoulder סֹרָ֑רֶת <WH5637> A stubborn וְאָזְנֵיהֶ֖ם <WH241> their ears הִכְבִּ֥ידוּ <WH3513> and stopped מִשְּׁמֽוֹעַ׃ <WH8085> that they should not hear

וְלִבָּ֞ם <WH3820> their hearts שָׂ֣מוּ <WH7760> Yea they made שָׁמִ֗יר <WH8068> [as] an adamant stone מִ֠שְּׁמוֹעַ <WH8085> lest they should hear אֶת־ <WH853> הַתּוֹרָ֤ה <WH8451> the law וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַדְּבָרִים֙ <WH1697> and the words אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which שָׁלַ֜ח <WH7971> hath sent יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> which the LORD צְבָאוֹת֙ <WH6635> of hosts בְּרוּח֔וֹ <WH7307> in his spirit בְּיַ֖ד <WH3027> by הַנְּבִיאִ֣ים <WH5030> prophets הָרִֽאשֹׁנִ֑ים <WH7223> the former וַֽיְהִי֙ <WH1961> came קֶ֣צֶף <WH7110> wrath גָּד֔וֹל <WH1419> therefore came a great מֵאֵ֖ת <WH853> יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> from the LORD צְבָאֽוֹת׃ <WH6635> of hosts

וַיְהִ֥י <WH1961> become כַאֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> he קָרָ֖א <WH7121> Therefore it is come to pass [that] as he cried וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> not שָׁמֵ֑עוּ <WH8085> and they would not hear כֵּ֤ן <WH3651> so יִקְרְאוּ֙ <WH7121> so they cried וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> not אֶשְׁמָ֔ע <WH8085> and I would not hear אָמַ֖ר <WH559> saith יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> the LORD צְבָאֽוֹת׃ <WH6635> of hosts

וְאֵ֣סָעֲרֵ֗ם <WH5590> But I scattered them with a whirlwind עַ֤ל <WH5921> among כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַגּוֹיִם֙ <WH1471> among all the nations אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> whom לֹֽא־ <WH3808> have not יְדָע֔וּם <WH3045> whom they knew וְהָאָ֙רֶץ֙ <WH776> not Thus the land נָשַׁ֣מָּה <WH8047> desolate אַֽחֲרֵיהֶ֔ם <WH310> after מֵֽעֹבֵ֖ר <WH5674> them that no man passed through וּמִשָּׁ֑ב <WH7725> nor returned וַיָּשִׂ֥ימוּ <WH7760> for they laid אֶֽרֶץ־ <WH776> land חֶמְדָּ֖ה <WH2532> the pleasant לְשַׁמָּֽה׃ <WH8074> was desolate פ
